mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_id, writer_id, title, notice_content, post_category, fix) values (notice_id_seq.nextval, #{writer_id}, #{title}, #{notice_content}, #{post_category}, #{fix})
mapper.select: select n.*, d.dept_name from notice n join admin a on a.admin_id = n.writer_id join lib_dept d on a.dept_id = d.dept_id where notice_id = #{notice_id}

select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from ( select notice_id, to_char(post_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as post_date, title, substr(post_category, 1, 2) as post_category from notice order by notice_id desc ) a ) where rn between 1 and #{end}
